meanings.definition: Following the first in order or time.
meanings.sent1: The secondo book in the series continues the story from the first book.
meanings.sent2: The meeting will take place on the secondo floor of the building.
meanings.sent3: The secondo cupcake in the box was decorated with colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent4: His secondo attempt at baking a cake turned out much better than the first.
meanings.sent5: The secondo half of the movie had a surprising plot twist.

meanings.definition: A musical part lower in pitch than the first.
meanings.sent1: The pianist played the secondo part while the other musician played the higher notes.
meanings.sent2: In the duet, the secondo provides a harmonious accompaniment to the melody.
meanings.sent3: The secondo of the song added depth to the overall musical composition.
meanings.sent4: The bassoon player's part was written as the secondo in the ensemble.
meanings.sent5: The orchestra conductor emphasized the importance of the secondo section in the piece.
